plot: A young woman, caught between an overzealous detective and a sadistic crime boss, fights for her survival at any cost.
title: Maxie's Girl
plot_es: A young woman, caught between an overzealous detective and a sadistic crime boss, fights for her survival at any cost.
plot_en: A young woman, caught between an overzealous detective and a sadistic crime boss, fights for her survival at any cost.
